TEXT.TITLE: AFG INDUSTRIES <AFG> DEBT AFFIRMED BY S/P
TEXT.BODY: Standard and Poor's Corp said it affirmed the BB-plus rating on AFG Industries Inc's 185 mln dlrs of subordinated debt. S and P said it believed AFG would make acquisitions of moderate size in the next few years. AFG's healthy cash flow and pro forma cash balances of 169 mln dlrs at September 30, 1986, should be adequate to fund internal expansion and moderate acquisitions. While AFG's participation in a 1.4 billion dlr bid for Lear Siegler Inc was aggressive, AFG was mainly interested in Lear's profitable auto glass operations, S and P noted. Reuter
